ROM.Changelog: # Changelog * **ROM Changes** *Version bump to v1.2 *Merged December Security patch *More visual bug fixes *QS tiles track color accent in Dot O theme. *Dot pixel theme has been made to have the same O white feel except with no QS tiles tint. *Added Network Indicator (Settings->Data Usage). *Added Changelog section inside About. *New settings icons. *Re-work on overall app icons. *Some new dope walls. *And many more bug fixes and performace enhancements. * **Device Specific Changes** * Bumped to version 1.2 * Used CAF kernel * Kernel upstream to 3.18.87 * Flac audio Fixed * Fixed BT Address * Improvement in performance * Fixed Battery Drain * Source sync on 16/12/2017
